segments.text: Hi , Tony . You look unhappy . What's wrong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Steven , I made a big mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really wish I hadn ’ t done it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What on earth are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got caught cheating . I feel so ashamed . The teacher saw me and told me I failed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know my father . If I fail , he'll kill me . I have to do well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what you should do is study hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know ... I know ... it's all my fault . I feel awful that I didn ’ t study , and I cheated , and I got caught .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So long as you learn from your mistakes .
segments.speaker: S1
